mainMessage: Hello, we are getting a few things ready...

writeDownAPrivateKeyToImport: To import an address, enter a private key and the key's password.

usernamInvalid: Username contains invalid characters. You can use all alphanumeric characters, except for zero, capital i, capital o, and lowercase L

exportWarning: Do not disclose your keys to anyone! Keep them in a safe place where only you have access.

howToExport: How would you like to export your keys?
minimizeToTray: Minimize to tray instead of the taskbar
minimizeToTrayMac: Minimize to tray instead of the dock
backupExplanation: You should backup your wallet whenever you generate a new address. There are two ways to backup a wallet. One is by backing up a file named wallet.dat, which contains your private keys and gives you access to your addresses. The second and the safest method is by printing the private keys and storing them in a safe place. Do not store the private keys in digital form. Export them using the function below, print them, and then delete the file. If anyone gains access to your private keys they can access your ECC.
operativeSystemNotificationDisable: Disable this option to only get notifications inside Sapphire
operativeSystemNotificationEnable: Enable this option to get operative system notifications
stakingNotificationsDisable: Disable this option to not get notified of staking rewards
stakingNotificationsEnable: Enable this option to get notified of staking rewards

unlockWalletExplanation1: This process unlocks your wallet for staking.
unlockWalletExplanation2: You will still be required to enter your password to send
walletLockedDescription: Your wallet is currently staking. Disable staking to send coins.
unlockWalletForSend: Unlock your wallet to continue with this transaction.
welcomeExplanation1: It's time to set up your new ECC wallet. Let's get started.
changeLater: You may change this later in Settings
pleaseSelectAFileNamed: Please select a file named wallet.dat
restartYourWalletMessage: Please wait while we try to restart your wallet. You may also try closing and reopening Sapphire.
